title: Font for wayfinding and information signage
content:
Hi, AIGA recently released a great font for information graphics.

[http://www.aiga.org/content.cfm/aigapubs](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115259/http:/www.aiga.org/content.cfm/aigapubs "http://www.aiga.org/content.cfm/aigapubs")

Rounded square version, clean, modern, etc.

This is exactly what I’m looking for, only a much larger set for a variety of situations.

Any suggestions?
